_header: Now joy be to the Trinity / Father Son and Holy Ghost
Bibliographic Ghosts: London, British Library Harley 1288, f. 120: this item does not appear in the MS, which has only 105 folios.
_description: A Christmas carol — five quatrains (abab) and burden: ‘Wassaill wassayll wassaill syng we / In worshipe of cristes natiuite’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Now Ioy be to the trynyteffader son & holy
                    gost…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Ioy we all of þat maydyn myld& Ioy haue they
                    þat mak good chereExplicit

         (http://image.ox.ac.uk/show?collection=balliol&manuscript=ms354).
